title: Readout of President Donald J. Trump’s Call with President Emmanuel Macron of France – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
April 26, 2018
President Donald J. Trump spoke yesterday with President Emmanuel Macron of France.  President Macron thanked the President and the First Lady for the wonderful state visit, the first of the Trump Presidency.  President Trump emphasized his deep affection for President and Mrs. Macron and thanked them for being his and Mrs. Trump’s cherished guests.
